text: Looking forward to the workshop this weekend! I'll be sure to share the insights with my clients at Serenity Path.

Tom, I understand how hard this is for you as a client of the rehabilitation center. But remember, you're not alone. We'll get through this together. Let's focus on using the mindfulness techniques we've practiced, and we'll discuss more strategies in our next session.
Every day brings new challenges, but it's worth it when you see the positive impact you can have on the lives of the clients at the rehabilitation center.
Thanks, I'll go over it and prepare some questions for the discussion.
